featured.text: Brahma called a council of the gods to help him decide on a place to hide the divinity.
Brahma thought for a long time and finally decided to hide their divinity in the center of their own being, for humans would never think to 25 it there.
Seeing this, Brahma, the chief god, decided to take their divinity away from them and hide it 22 it could never be found.
However, they often took their divinity for granted and 21 abused it.

definition.en_def: The state of being divine; the nature of a god.
definition.example: The ancient Greeks believed in the divinity of their gods.
